overview: Legendary adult star Nina Hartley is back for more lesbian action in Part 2 of Sweetheart Video's best selling series, Nina Loves Girls! In this volume, Nina explores four very different ladies whose sexual appetites vary from aggressive and dominant (Syd Blakovich), eager and energetic (young blonde Nicole Ray), sensual and womanly (Dia Zevera to loving, intense and explosive (lesbian icon Justine Joli).  Director Nica Noelle also continues her in-depth interviews of one of the most popular adult stars of all time, asking Nina some tough, thought provoking questions about life, love and sex. Written and Directed by Nica Noelle.
title: Nina Loves Girls 2
